389b3(mdo sde): g.yo ba// de tshe ring bsrel yod par 'gyur// nam zhig srin bu pad pa kun// so ni dkar por skyes gyur te// rno zhing chen por gyur pa na// de tshe ring bsrel yod par 'gyur// mtho ris su
389b4(mdo sde): ni 'dzeg pa'i phyir// nam zhig ri bong rwa rnams las// skas ni legs par byas gyur pa// de tshe ring bsrel yod par 'gyur// nam zhig skas ni der 'dzegs te/ byibs zla ba bza'
389b5(mdo sde): bdang // sgra gcan la yang gnod byed pa// de tshe ring bsel yod par 'gyur// grong na rgyu ba'i sdang bu yis// nam zhig rdza ma'i chang 'thungs te// khyim na gnas par byed 'gyur ba/
389b6(mdo sde): de tshe ring bsril yod par 'gyur// nam zhig bong bu bde gyur la// mchu mar bim pa 'dra gyur cing // glu gar rnams la mkhas gyur pa// de tshe ring bsrel yod par 'gyur// nam
389b7(mdo sde): zhig 'ug pa bya rog rnams// dben par dong nas rtse ba dang // phan tshun 'thun par 'gyur ba na// de tshe ring bsrel yod par 'gyur// pa la sha yi lo ma rnams// rin chen sna
390a1(mdo sde): gsum gdugs gyur te// char 'bab skyabs su nam gyur pa// de tshe ring bsrel yod par 'gyur// nam zhig rgya mtsho gru bo che// 'khrul 'khor dang ni g.yor//
390a2(mdo sde): mor bcas// thang la byung ste 'gro ba na// de tshe ring bsrel yod par 'gyur// nam zhig bya ni 'ug pa yis// ro za spros kyi dad ldang ba/ mchu la thogs te 'gro 'gyur ba/
390a3(mdo sde): de tshe ring bsrel yod par 'gyur// slob dpon lung ston pa bram ze ko'u di n+yas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag thos nas/ li tsa byi gzhon nu 'jig rten thams cad kyis mthong na dga'
390a4(mdo sde): ba la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis slar smras pa/ legs so legs so gzhon nu mchog/ rgyal ba'i sras po tshig po che// dpa' zhing thabs la mkhas ldan pa// lung bstan pa//
390a5(mdo sde): ni dam pa thob// 'jig rten mgon po skyob pa po// de bzhin gshegs pa'i che ba nyid// bsam gyis mi khyab go rims bzhin// gzhon nus bdag la mnyan par gyis// sangs
390a6(mdo sde): rgyus yul ni bsam mi khyab// de bzhin gshegs rnams mtshungs pa med// sangs rgyas thams cad rtag tu zhi// sangs rgyas thams cad yang dag byung // sangs rgyas thams cad kha
390a7(mdo sde): dog mtshungs// 'di ni sangs rgyas chos nyid yin// bcom ldan 'das ni bcos ma min// de bzhin gshegs pa ma skyes te// rdo rje lta bur sra ba'i sku// sprul pa'i sku ni ston par mdzad//
390b1(mdo sde): drang srong chen po'i ring bsrel ni// yungs 'bru tsam zhes bya ba med// sku la rus pa khrag med na// ring bsrel yod par ga la 'gyur// sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir// thabs kyi/
390b2(mdo sde): ring bsrel bzhag par mdzad// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos kyi sku// de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings// chos ston mdzad pa ci 'dra ba// bcom ldan 'das kyi skud 'dra/
390b3(mdo sde): bdag gis 'di thos shes nas ni// bdag gis dam pa gsol ba byas// de nyid kho na lung bstan phyir// gtam gleng ba mi bdag gis byas// de nas lha'i bu sum khri nyis stong gis de bzhin /
390b4(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i sku tshe'i tshad bstan pa zab mo de lta bu de dag thos nas/ thams cad kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ de dag yid kyi kun tu rtog
390b5(mdo sde): pa rab tu dga' nas sgra dbyangs gcig tu tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// sangs rgyas mya ngan yod mi 'da'o// chos kyang nub par mi 'gyur te// sems can yongs su smin
390b6(mdo sde): mdzad phyir// yongs su mya ngan 'da' ba ston// sangs rgyas bcom ldan bsam mi khyab// de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pa'i sku// sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir// bkod
390b7(mdo sde): ba rnam pa sna tshogs ston// de nas byang chub sems dpa'i mdzes pa'i tog gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang / skyes bu dam pa de gnyis las/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub
391a1(mdo sde): pa'i sku tshe'i tshad bstan pa thos nas/ tshim nim mgul yi rangs shing rab tu dga' ste/ dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas/ dga' ba dang mgub rgya chen pos khyab
391a2(mdo sde): par gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku tshe'i tshad bstan pa 'di bshad pa'i tshe/ sems can grangs med dpag tu med pa dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes
391a3(mdo sde): so// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag kyang mi snang bar gyur to// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku tshe'i tshad bstan pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste
391a4(mdo sde): gnyis pa'o// // de nas byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tig gnyid kyis log pa'i rmi lam na/ gser gyi rnga kun tu snang ba 'di lta ste/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'kho
391a5(mdo sde): 'dra ba zhig mthong ngo // phyogs thams cad na'ang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med dpag tu med pa dag rin po che'i shing drung na/ rin po che bai DUR+Ya'i khri rnams la bzhugs shing /
391a6(mdo sde): 'khor brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor te/ mdun gyis bltas nas chos ston pa mthong ngo // de nas yang skyes bu bram ze'i gzugs lta bu zhig rje de brdung ba mthong ste/ rnga'i sgra de las bstan/
391a7(mdo sde): pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di lta bu 'di dag byung ba thos so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog sad ma thag tu bstan pa'i tshigs su bcad pa de dag rjes su dran no// rjes su dran
391b1(mdo sde): nas kyang de'i mtshan mo sad pa dang / rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po nas byung ste/ srog chags stong phrag du ma dang lhan cig tu bya rgod kyi phung po'i rig la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba/
391b2(mdo sde): der song ste byin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo zos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs
391b3(mdo sde): gcig tu 'dug nas/ byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog gis/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ rmi lam na gang rnga'i sgra las bstan pa'i tshigs
391b4(mdo sde): su bcad pa thos pa de dag gsol to// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ rmi lam mthong ba'i le'u zhes bya ba ste gsum pa'o// // nub gcig
391b5(mdo sde): g.yel ba med par yang // gdag gi rmi lam gyur pa ni/ mdzes pa'i rnga chen mthong ba ste// thams cad du ni gser gyi 'od// ji ltar nyi ma bzhin du 'bar// kun tu rnam par lhang nge ste/
391b6(mdo sde): phyogs bcu dag tu snang bar gyur// kun tu rin chen shing drung na// rin chen bai DUR+Ya dag gi/ khri la sangs rgyas rnams bzhugs te// brgya stong phrag ni du ma yi// 'khor dbus mdun
391b7(mdo sde): kyis bltas pa mthong // bram ze'i gzugs ni 'dra ba zhig/ rnga chen rab tu brdung bar mthong // de yis de la brdungs pa dang // tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag byung // gser 'od dam/
392a1(mdo sde): parnga chen sgra yis ni// stong gsum 'jig rten 'jig rten gsum 'di na// ngan song sdug bsngal gshin rje'i sdug bsngal dang // dbul ba'i sdug bsngal sdug/
392a2(mdo sde): bsngal zhi bar shog/ rnga bo che yi rnga skad 'di yis ni// 'jig rten rmongs pa thams cad zhi gyur cig/ ji ltar thub dbang 'jigs med 'jig zhi ltar// sems can 'jig med 'jigs
392a3(mdo sde): dang bral bar shog/ ji ltar 'khor bar kun mkhyen thub dbang po// 'phags pa'i yon tan kun dang ldan pa ltar// ste dgu'i ting 'dzin byang chub yan lag gi/ yon tan ldan zhing yon tan rgya
392a4(mdo sde): mtshor gyur// rnga bo che yi rnga skad 'di yis ni// sems can thams cad tshangs pa'i dbyangs ldan 'gyur// sangs rgyas byang chub dam pa mchog reg shog/ chos kyi 'khor lo dge ba skor gyur
392a5(mdo sde): cig/ bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab bzhugs par shog/ 'gro la phan phyir chos kyang ston gyur cig/ nyon mongs 'joms gyur sdug bsngal sel bar shog/ 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug
392a6(mdo sde): zhi gyur cig/ sems can gang dag ngan song sar gnas te// rus pa'i lus la me lce rab 'bar ba// de dag rnga chen bsgrags pa thos gyur cig/ sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal lo zhes tshig thos
392a7(mdo sde): shog/ sems can kun gyis skye ba brgya dag dang / skye ba stong phrag bye ba skye dran shog/ thub pa'i dbang po rtag tu dran gyur cig/ de dag gi ni rgya chen gsung thos shog/ rnga bo che yi rnga skad 'di
392b1(mdo sde): yis ni// sangs rgyas rnams dang rtag tu 'grogs rnyed 'gyur// sdig pa'i las rnams rnam par spong bar shog/ bya ba dge ba rnams ni spyod gyur cig/ mi dang lha dang srog
392b2(mdo sde): chags thams cad kyi// de dag bsam dang smon lam gang yin pa// rnga bo che yi rnga skad 'di yis ni// de dag rnams kyis re kun rdzogs gyur cig/ sems can gang dag sems
392b3(mdo sde): dmyal mi bzad de// lus la me lce kun tu rab tu 'bar// skyabs med mya ngan bcas shing yongs 'khyam pa// me rnams de dag rab tu zhi bar shog/ sems dmyal yi dgas mi yi
392b4(mdo sde): 'jig rten na// sems can mi bzad sdug bsngal drag po gang // rnga bo che yi sgra skad 'di yis ni// de dag rnams kyi sdug bsngal kun zhi shog/ rten med dpung gnyen med pa dang // skyabs/
392b5(mdo sde): med par ni gyur pa dag/ de dag rnams ni skyob pa dang // dpung gnyen rten mchog bdag gyur cig/ sangs rgyas rkang gnyis dam pa dag/ thugs brtse thugs rje ldan pa'i thugs// gang dag
392b6(mdo sde): phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na// bzhugs pa bdag la dgongs su gsol// bdag gis sngon chad sdig pa'i las// shin tu mi bzad gang bgyis pa// stobs bcu'i spyan sngar
392b7(mdo sde): bdag mchis te// de dag thams cad bshags par bgyi// pha ma dag tu mi 'dzin dang // sangs rgyas rnams su mi 'dzin dang // dge ba dag tu mi 'dzin pas// sdig pa bdag gis gang
393a1(mdo sde): bgyis dang // phyug pa'i rgyags pas dregs pa dang // rigs dang longs spyod rgyags pa dang // bzhon pa'i rgyags pas dregs pa yis// bdag gis sdig pa gang
393a2(mdo sde): bgyis dang // nyes bsams nyes par smras pa dang // nyes par bgyis pa'i las rnams dang // nyes pa'i dmigs su ma bltas dang // bdag gis sdig pa gang bgyis dang // byis pa'i blo/
393a3(mdo sde): yis 'jug pa dang // mi shes mun pa'i sems dang ni// sdig pa'i grogs po'i dbang gyur dang // bdag gi rnam par 'khrugs sems dang // rtse mo dga' ba'i dbang nyid dang // mya ngan dang
393a4(mdo sde): ni dad dbang dang // nor gyis mi chog nyen pa yis// bdag gis sdig pa gang gis dang // 'phags min skyo bo 'dre ba dang // phrag dog ser sna'i sgyu dang ni// g.yo dang dbul ba'i nyes pa yis//
393a5(mdo sde): bdag gis sdig pa gang bgyis dang // 'phongs pa 'byung ba dus kyi tshe// 'dod pa rnams kyis 'jig rgyu da // phyug po ma yin gyur pa yis// bdag gis sdig pa gang bgyis dang // g.yo/
393a6(mdo sde): ba'i sems kyi dbang nyid dang // 'dod dang khro ba'i dbang dag dang // bkres dang skom gyis nyen pa yis// bdag gis sdig pa gang bgyis dang // bza' bdag dang btung ba dang //
393a7(mdo sde): bud med rgyu dang gos kyi phyi// nyon mongs gdung ba sna tshogs kyis// bdag gis sdig pa gang bgyis dang // lus dang ngag dang yid kyi sdig/ nyes par spyad pa rnam gsum bsags/
393b1(mdo sde): 'di 'dra'i tshul gyis gang bgyis pa// de dag thams cad bdag 'chags so// sangs rgyas rnams dang chos rnams dang // de bzhin nyan thos rnams la yang // gus pa ma lags//
393b2(mdo sde): gang bgyis pa// de dag thams cad bdag 'chags so// gang yang rang sangs rgyas rnams dang // byang chub sems dpa' rnams la yang // gus pa ma lags bgyis pa rnams//
393b3(mdo sde): de dag thams cad bdag 'chags so// dam chos smra ba rnams la yang // gus pa ma lags gang bgyis dang // chos la'ang gus par ma bgyis pa// de dag thams cad bdag 'chags
393b4(mdo sde): so// bdag gis rtag tu mi shes pas// dam pa'i chos ni spangs pa dang // pha ma rnams la ma gus gang // de dag thams cad bdag 'chags so// blun pa dang ni byis pa dang // 'dod
393b5(mdo sde): chags zhe sdang gti mug dang // nga rgyal dregs pas bsgribs bgyis pa// de dag thams cad bdag 'chags so// bdag gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten du// stobs bcu rnams la
393b6(mdo sde): mchod par shog/ bdag ni phyogs bcur sems can rnams// sdug bsngal kun nas 'don gyur cig/ sems can bsam gyis mi khyab kun// sa bcu dag la 'god par shog/ sa
393b7(mdo sde): bcu dag la gnas nas kyang // thams cad de bzhin gshegs gyur cig/ ji srid sdug bsngal rgya mtsho las// de kun thar bgyid nus srid du// sems can re re'i phyir yang ni// bskal
394a1(mdo sde): pa bye bar spyod par shog/ gser 'od dam pa zhes bgyi ba// las rnams thams cad byang byed pa// zab mo dag ni ston pa 'di// sems can de dag ston gyur cig/
394a2(mdo sde): gang gis bskal pa stong rnams su// sdig pa shin tu mi bzad bgyis// lan cig rab tu bshags pa yis// de dag thams cad byang bar 'gyur// gang gis las kyi sgrib pa rnams//
394a3(mdo sde): myur du yang dag zad gyur pa// gser 'od dam pa dge ba yi// bshags pa 'di dag bshags nas ni// rin chen 'byung gnas mchog bcu po// sa bcu la ni gnas par bgyi// sangs
394a4(mdo sde): rgyas yon tan snang bar bgyi// srid pa'i mtsho las bsgral bar bgyi// sangs rgyas rgya mtsho chu bo dang // yon tan rgya mtsho zab mo de// sangs rgyas yon tan bsam yas kyis// thams
394a5(mdo sde): cad mkhyen du rdzogs par bgyi// ting 'dzin brgya phrag stong rnams dang // gzugs rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dang // dbang stobs byang chub yan lag gis// stobs bcu dam par 'gyur
394a6(mdo sde): bar bgyi// dgongs pa'i thugs kyis sangs rgyas rnams// bdag la rnam par gzigs su gsol// thugs rje ldan pa'i thugs kyis ni// nongs par rab tu gzung du gsol/
394a7(mdo sde): bdag gis bskal pa brgya rnams su// sngon chad sdig pa gang bgyis pa// de phyir bdag ni mya ngan sems// 'phongs dang mya ngan 'jigs pas gzir// sdig pa'i las la
394b1(mdo sde): 'jigs par bgyid// yid ni rtag tu dman par gyur// gang dang gang du spyod bgyid pa// bdag ni gang du'ang dga' ma mchis// sangs rgyas thams cad thugs rje ldan// 'gro ba kun/
394b2(mdo sde): gyi 'jigs sel ba// nongs par rab tu gzung du gsol// 'jigs pa dag las bdag thar mdzod// bdag gi nyon mongs las rnams kyi// dri ma de bzhin gshegs pas shes//
394b3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas rnams kyis bdag la ni// snying rje'i chu yis bkru bar gsol// sdig pa thams cad bshags par bgyi// sngon chad bdag gis gang bgyis dang // da ltar bdag gi
394b4(mdo sde): sdig pa gang // de dag thams cad bdag 'chags so// nongs par bgyis pa'i las rnams kun// slan chad mi bgyid bsdam par bgyi// bdag gis nongs par bgyis pa
394b5(mdo sde): gang // sdig de bcab par mi bgyi'o// lus kyi las ni rnam gsum dang // ngag gi rnam pa bzhi dag dang // yid kyi rnam pa gsum po rnams// de dag thams cad bdag
394b6(mdo sde): 'chags so// lus kyis bgyis dang ngag gi las// yid kyis rnam par bsams pa dang // las rnams bcu po bgyis pa dag/ de dag thams cad bdag 'chags so// mi dge'i
394b7(mdo sde): las bcu spangs nas su// dge ba bcu po bsten bgyis te// sa bcu la ni bdag gnas bgyi// stobs bcu mchog tu 'gyur bar bgyi// bdag gis sdig pa'i las gang
395a1(mdo sde): dag/ mi 'dod 'bras bu thob bgyid pa// sangs rgyas spyan sngar mchis nas ni// de dag thams cad bshags par bgyi// 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir gang dag/
395a2(mdo sde): dang // 'jig rten khams ni gnan+da dag tu// gang rnams dge ba'i las bgyid ga/ de dag kun la yi dang // lus dang dag dang yid kyis klung // bdag gis bsod nams gang
395a3(mdo sde): bsgrubs pa// bdag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba des// byang chub mchog la reg par bgyi// srid 'gro nyam ngar byis pa'i blo yis ni// shin tu mi bzad sdig pa gang bgyis pa// stobs
395a4(mdo sde): bcu mi mnyam spyan sngar mchis nas ni// sdig pa de kun so sor bshags par bgyi// skye ba nyam srid pa nyam nga dang // 'jig rten nyam nga g.yo sems nyam nga bar// lus /
395a5(mdo sde): kyi spyod pa nyam nga sna tshogs kyis// bdag gis sdig pa gang bsags de 'chags so// byis pa blun byas nyon mongs nyam nga dang // sdig pa'i grogs dang phrad pa nyam nga dang // srid pa
395a6(mdo sde): nyam nga 'dod chags nyam dang // zhe sdang gti mug mun pa nyamang dang // dral ba'i nyamang dus kyi nyam nga dang // bsod nams bsgrubs pa'i nyamang dag gis kyang // rgyal ba mi
395a7(mdo sde): mnyam mngon sum mchis nas ni// sdig pa de kun so sor bshags par bgyi// sangs rgyas gser mdog ri snang ri rab 'dra// yon tan rgya mtsho 'dra la phyag 'tshal lo// rgyal
395b1(mdo sde): bde dag rnams la skyabs su mchi// rgyal ba de dag rnams la mgos phyag 'tshal// gser mdog gser ni dri ma med pa'i gser gyi 'od// dri med rnam dag bai DUR+Ya yi yan
395b2(mdo sde): lag spyan// sangs rgyas nyi ma dpal gzi grags 'bar 'byung ba'i gnas// thugs rje'i 'od zer dag gis mun pa mun nag bsal// yan lag rab tu dri med rab bzang rnam par mdzes
395b3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas nyi ma yan lag dri med gser 'dras khyab// nyon mongs mes gdungs yid can 'bar ba'i me 'dra la// thub pa zla ba'i 'od zer dra bas tshim par mdzad// mtshan mchog
395b4(mdo sde): sum cu gnyis kyis dbang po yan lag mdzes// dpe byad bzang po dag gis yan lag rnam par mdzes// dpal gzi bsod nams 'bar 'khrugs 'od zer 'dra ba yis// 'jig
395b5(mdo sde): rten gsum na mun khrod nyi ma bzhin du bzhugs// dri med rgya chen kha dog sna tshogs bai DUR+Ya// skya rengs dmar dang dngul dang shel bzhin yan lag dmar// 'od zer dra ba rnam pa sna tshog
395b6(mdo sde): legs brgyan pa// thub chen khyod ni nyi ma bzhin du de yis mdzes// mya ngan 'khrug po'i mchi chu dga' ba'i dba' rlabs can// 'khor ba'i klung chen 'phongs pa'i chu bor lhung ba la// /
395b7(mdo sde): sdug bsngal rgya mtsho mchog tu rtsub cing shugs drag pa// bde gshegs nyi ma'i 'od zer mang po rnams kyis skems// yan lag gser gyi mdog tu rnam par snang // ye shes
396a1(mdo sde): 'byung gnas 'jig rten gsum kun mchog/ rab mdzes mtshan gyis yan lag rnams spras pa// sangs rgyas gser sku 'bar la phyag 'tshal lo// ji ltar rgyu
396a2(mdo sde): mtsho'i chu ni dpag med dang // ji ltar sa las rdul mtha' yas dang // ji ltar ri rab rdo mtha' mtshungs med dang // ji ltar nam mkha'i mtha' ni mtha' yas pa// de bzhin sangs rgyas yon tan//
396a3(mdo sde): mtha' yas te// sems can kun gyis shes par mi nus so// bskal pa du mar gzhal cing bsems kyang ni// yon tan mtha' ma shes par mi nus so// chu ni skra yi rtse mo'i tshad tsam dang //
396a4(mdo sde): rdor bcas ring bcas rgya mtshor bcas pa ni// bskal par bgrangs na shes par nus kyang srid// sangs rgyas yon tan pa mtha' shes mi nus// yon tan kha dog snyan dang grags pa dang /
396a5(mdo sde): dge ba'i mtshan gyis brgyan pa'i sku lus dang // dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus brgyan pa yis// sems can thams cad de 'drar gyur par shog/ bdag gis dge ba'i las rnams 'di dag
396a6(mdo sde): gis// 'jig rten mi ring sangs rgyas 'gyur bar bgyi// 'gro la phan phyir chos kyang bstan par bgyi// sems can sdug bsngal mang gzir thar par bgyi// stobs bcas sder bcas bdun
396a7(mdo sde): las rgyal bar bgyi// chos kyi 'khor lo dge ba bskor bar bgyi// bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab gnas par bgyi// bdud rtsi'i chu yis sems can tshim par bgyi// ji ltar sngon gyi rgyal
396b1(mdo sde): ba'i rdzogs pa ltar// pha rol phyin drug bla med rdzogs par bgyi// nyon mongs gzhom zhing sdug bsngal bsal bar bgyi// 'dod chags gti mug zhe sdang zhi bar bgyi// skye ba brgya dang skye/
396b2(mdo sde): ba bye ba stong // bdag ni rtag tu skye ba dran par bgyi// thub pa'i dbang po rtag tu dran par bgyi// de yi gsung ni rgya chen mos par bgyi// bdag ni dge ba'i las rnams 'di dag gis//
396b3(mdo sde): rtag tu sangs rgyas 'grogs pa rnyed par bgyi// sdig pa'i las rnams rnam par spang bar bgyi// dge ba'i 'byung gnas dge rnams dpyad par bgyi// zhing rnams kun na srog chags thams
396b4(mdo sde): cad kyang // 'jig rten dag na sdug bsngal kun zhir gyur// sems can dbang po ma tshang yan lag nyams// de kun de'u dbang po tshang bar shog/ gang dag nad btab nyam chung lus nyams dang // /
396b5(mdo sde): phyogs bcu dag na skyabs med gyur pa rnams// de kun myur du nad las thar gyur cig/ nad med stob sad dbang po rnyed par shog/ gang dag rgyal po chom rkun spre'u bsdigs gsod thug dang // sdug
396b6(mdo sde): bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs brgya yis 'phongs gyur pa// sems can nyam thag gyur cing sdug bsngal de dag kun// 'jigs mchog mi bzad brgya po de las thar gyur cig/ gang dag brdegs shing
396b7(mdo sde): bcing bas bcings gzir ba// 'phongs pa sna tshogs dag na gnas gyur cing // nyon mongs stong phrag du mas dkrugs nas kyang // 'jigs pa mi bzad mya ngan sna tshogs rnyed// de dag thams cad
397a1(mdo sde): bcings las grol gyur cig/ brdeg pa dag ni brdeg las thar gyur cig/ gsod pa rnams kyang srog dang ldan gyur cig/ 'phongs gyur thams cad 'jigs pa
397a2(mdo sde): med par shog/ sems can thams cad bkres sred skom gyis gzir// de dag zas skom sna tshogs rnyed par shog/ long bas gzugs rnams sna tshogs mthong gyur cig/ 'on pas
397a3(mdo sde): yid 'ong sna rnams thos par shog/ gcer bu rnams kyis sna tshogs gos rnyed gyur// sems cin dbul pos gter rnams rnyed par shog/ nor 'bru rin chen sna tshogs mang po yis/
397a4(mdo sde): sems can thams cad bde dang ldan par shog/ gang yang sdug bsngal tshor bas gnod ma gyur// sems cad thams cad blta na sdug pa dang // gzugs bzang mdzes shing tshul du shis//
397a5(mdo sde): par shog/ rtag tu bde ba du ma rdzogs gyur cig/ yid kyis zas skom rab 'byor bsod nams dag/ bsams ma thag tu de dag grub gyur cig/ rdza rnga cang te'u pi lang sgra snyan dang // chu
397a6(mdo sde): mig mtshe'u rdzing bu lteng ka dang // gser gyi pad+ma ut+pal pad+ma can// zas sko mgos nor mu tig nor bu dbyig/ rgyan gser rin chen sna tshogs bai DUR+Ya// de dag bsams ma thag tu grub
397a7(mdo sde): gyur cig/ 'jig rten gang na'ang sdug bsngal sgra ma byung // sems can gcig kyang mi 'phrod mthong ma gyur// de dag thams cad kha dog rgya chen dang // phan tshun du ni 'od byed gyur par shog/
397b1(mdo sde): mi yi 'jig rten phun sum tshogs gang yod// de dang bsams par skye ba de dag gyur// bsam pa thams cad bsams ma thag tu yang // bsod nams 'bras bus yongs su rdzogs
397b2(mdo sde): par shog/ spos dang 'phreng ba dag dang byug pa dang // gos dang phye mi me tog sna tshogs dag/ ljon shing dag las dus gsum 'bab par shog/ sems can de dag len cing dgar gyur cig/
397b3(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa bsam las thams cad dang // rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos dang // rdul bral dri med brtan pa'i chos la yang // phyogs bcu rnams su mchod pa
397b4(mdo sde): byed par shog/ 'gro ba dma' ba thams cad spong gyur cig/ mi khom brgyad po dag las 'das par shog/ ngal ba'i rgyal po dam pa thob gyur cig/ rtag tu sangs rgyas 'grogs pa thob
397b5(mdo sde): par shog/ rtag tu mthon po'i rigs su skye bar shog/ nor dang 'bru yi mdzod rnams 'byor gyur cig/ snyan dang grags dang gzugs dang kha dog gis// bskal pa du mar legs par brgyan
397b6(mdo sde): par shog/ bud med thams cad rtag tu bor gyur te// dpa' zhing rtul bod mkhas shing gsal bar shog/ de kun rtag tu byang chub phyir spyod gyur// pha rol phyin pa drug la spyod par shog
397b7(mdo sde): phyogs bcu dag na rin chen shing dbang drung // sangs rgyas de bzhugs rin chen bai DUR+Ya'i// khri la bzhugs pa dag ni mthong gyur cig/ chos bstan pa yang de dag thos par shog/ bdag
398a1(mdo sde): gis sdig pa'i las rnams bsgrubs pa ni// srid pa nyam ngar sngon chad gang bsgrubs pa// sdig las gang dag mi 'dod 'bras thob pa// de dag thams cad ma
398a2(mdo sde): lus zad gyur cig/ sems can gang dag srid par bcings gnas kun// 'khor ba'i zhags pa'i theg pas dam bcings pa// shes rab lag gis bcings pa bkrol bar shog
398a3(mdo sde): sdug bsngal rnams las thar bar myur gyur cig/ sems can gang dag 'dzam bu'i gling 'di dang // gang dag 'jig rten khams ni gzhan rnams na// bsod nams sna tshogs zab mo rnams
398a4(mdo sde): byed pa// de dag kun la rjes su yi rang ngo // lus dang ngag dang yid kyis bsgrubs pa yi// bdag gis rjes su yi rang bsod nams de// bdag gis smon grub 'bras bu yod par shog
398a5(mdo sde): byang chub rdul bral bla med thob gyur cig/ gang dag rtag tu dri ma bral ba dang // dri med yid kyis phyag 'tshal bstod pa dang // yongs su bsngo ba brjod pa 'di yis na// bskal pa drug cu
398a6(mdo sde): ngan song spong bar gyur// tshigs su bcad pa brjod pa 'di dag gis// skyes pa bud med bram ze rgyal rigs las// thal sbyar 'dug ste rgyal ba gang bstod pa// tshe rabs kun tu skye ba dran
398a7(mdo sde): par 'gyur// yan lag dbang po kun gyis yan lag brgyan// bsod na mos yon tan sna tshogs rnams dang ldan// mi dbang rgyal pos rtag tu de mchog de// de dang de dag kun ni de 'dran
398b1(mdo sde): 'gyur// gang dag rna ba'i bu gar bshags pa 'di ni grags gyur pa// de dag sangs rgyas gcig gi gan nas dge ba byas ma yin// gnyis la ma yin bzhi la ma yin lnga min bcu la/
398b2(mdo sde): min// de ltar sangs rgyas stong gi gnas nas dge ba byas ma yin// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las// bshags pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste bzhi pa'o// /
398b3(mdo sde): 'phags pa gser 'od dom mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo bam po gnyis pa/ de nas bcom ldan 'das
398b4(mdo sde): kyis/ rigs kyi lha mo byang chub yang dag par bsdus pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi lha mo de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rgyal po gser gyi lag pa'i dbang po zhes bya ba des/ de bzhin
398b5(mdo sde): gshegs pa thams cad la bstod pa pad+ma'i 'byung gnas 'dis 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mngon par bstod do// rgyal ba gang
398b6(mdo sde): dag sngar byung gyur pa dang // phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten dag na gang gzhes pa// rgyal ba de dag rnams la phyag bgyi'o// rgyal ba de dag kun la bdag gis bstod// thub dbang zhi zhing rab zhi rnam
398b7(mdo sde): par dag/ sku ni gser gyi mdog tu rab tu gda'// dbyangs rnams kun gyis sangs rgyas gsung snyan te// tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs rab tu bsgrags par gsungs// bung ba rma bya ut+pal
399a1(mdo sde): sngon po'i dbu// mthon mthing lcang lo bya ni tsa sha 'dra// kha ba dung ltar rab tu dkar ba'i tshems// rtag tu gser ltar rnam par mdzes par gda'// spyan ni ridri zhing /
399a2(mdo sde): mthon mthing dri ma med// ut+pal sngon po rab tu rgyas pa 'dra// ljags ni che zhing legs la pad+ma'i mdog/ pad+ma 'drar snang pad+ma'i zeb 'dra// zhal gyi mdzod spu pad rtsa dung 'dra yang // bai DUR+Ya
399a3(mdo sde): yi mdog 'dra g.yas su 'khyil// thub pa'i zla ba phra zhing zad pa 'dra// sku yi lte ba bung ba gsil ba bzhin// zhal mthu'i shings ni rtag tu lhag ge ste// 'jam zhing sA la'i gser ltar
399a4(mdo sde): kha dog bzang // rtag par rgyun du rgyal ba thams cad kyi// ro mchog 'jam zhing dam pa'i mchog rab 'phags// spu yi bu ga nas ni re re skyes// spu rnams skyes pa g.yas su 'khyil ba
399a5(mdo sde): ste// mthon mthing 'od 'bar 'tsher zhing lcang lo can// rma bya'i mgrin sdug 'dra bar sngo la mdzes// bltams ma thag tu sku yis snang bar bgyis// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten dag ni
399a6(mdo sde): thams cad gang // 'jig rten gsum na sdug bsngal mtha' yas zhi// bde ba kun gyis sems can rnams kyang tshim// sems dmyal 'gro dang dud 'gro'i 'gro bdag/ yi dgas lha
399a7(mdo sde): gnas mi yi 'gro rnams su// sems can de dag thams cad bde bas tshim// ngan song 'gro ba rnams ni thams cad zhi// kha dog mdog bzang gser dang 'dra ba'i 'od// btso ma'i gser
399b1(mdo sde): ltar rab tu snang ba'i sku// bde gshegs zla ba rab tu dri med zhal// 'dzum zhing rnam mdzes shin tu dri med zhal// gzhon nu btsas 'dra sku lus yan lag 'jam// seng ge 'dra bar
399b2(mdo sde): rtsal gyis nin pa'i mchog/ phyag ring phyag ni rab tu ring ba ste// sa la'i lcug ma rlung gis bskyod pa bzhin// 'dom gang 'od 'bar 'od zer rab tu gtong // nyi ma stong pas rab tu lhag ge'o//
399b3(mdo sde): thub pa'i dbang po'i sku mchog dri ma med// zhing rnams mtha' yas thams cad rab tu snang // sangs rgyas 'od ni rnam par ldang nge bas// zhing rnams mtha' yas brgya stong rnams su yang
399b4(mdo sde): mtshan byed zla ba nyi ma mang po dag/ de dag thams cad 'od ni med par gyur// sangs rgyas nyi ma 'jig rten sgron ma ste// sangs rgyas nyi ma brgya phrag stong rnams ni// zhing rnams mtha' yas/
399b5(mdo sde): stong phrag brgya dag na// de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyi ma sems can mthong // bsod nams stong phrag brgya dang ldan pa'i sku// yon tan kun gyis rab tu brgyan pa'i sku// glang chen dbang
399b6(mdo sde): po'i sna 'dra rgyal ba'i phyag/ phyag dang zhabs 'od rab mdzes dri ma med// sa yi steng gi rdul dang mtshungs 'dra snyed// phra ba'i rdul snyed sangs rgyas gang 'das dang // gang dag phra ba'i rdul
399b7(mdo sde): snyed byung ba dang // gang dag phra ba'i rdul snyed bzhugs pa yi// rgyal ba de dag la ni rab dang ba'o// ngag yid lus kyis me tog dngul ba dang // spos rnams dbul dang bsngags pa brgya dang ni//
400a1(mdo sde): dge ba'i sems kyis kyang ni phyag 'tshal lo// rgyal ba'i yon tan gang dag dger gyur pa// snying po mchog rab sna tshogs du ma ste// bdag gis bskal pa stong /
400a2(mdo sde): du lce brgya yis// sangs rgyas yon tan brjod par mi nus so// rgyal ba gcig gi yon tan rnams kyang ni// lce stong gis kyang cung zad brjod mi nus// bdag gis rgyal ba dag ni tham/
400a3(mdo sde): cad kyi// yon tan gcig rgyas brjod par ga le nus// lhar bcas 'jig rten thams cad mtshor gyur to// srid pa'i rtse mo man chad chus gang ga/ skra yi rtse mos dpag par nus srid kyi//
400a4(mdo sde): bde gshegs rnams kyi yon tan gcig la min// lus dang ngag yid rab tu dang ba yis// rgyal ba kun la bdag gis bsngags bstod pas// bdag gis bsod nams 'bras bu
400a5(mdo sde): mchog bsags gang // des ni sems can rgyal ba reg gyur cig/ de ltar rgyal pos sangs rgyas rnams bstod nas// rgyal po 'di ltar smon lam 'debs pa ni// ma 'ongs bskal pa
400a6(mdo sde): mtha' yas rnams su yang // gang dang gang du bdag ni skyes pa na// rmi lam du ni 'di 'dra'i rnga lta zhing // der ni bshags 'di 'dra mnyan par bgyi// rgyal stong pad+ma 'byung rgyal 'di 'dra ba/
400a7(mdo sde): skye ba de dang der ni rnyed par bgyi// sangs rgyas yon tan mtha' yas mtshungs med dang // gang dag bskal pa stong du rnyed dka' ba// de dag rmi lam du yang mnyan par bgyi// nyin gyur
400b1(mdo sde): chu yang de dag bshad par bgyi// sems can sdug bsngal mtsho las thar par bgyi// pha rol phyin pa drug po rdzogs par bgyi// byin nas byang chub bla med thob pa bgyi// bdag /
400b2(mdo sde): zhing ni lhod pa med gyur cig/ rnga phul rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu dang // rgyal ba thams cad la yang bstod pa'i rgyus// shAkya thub dbang mngon du blta bar bgyi// der ni bdag
400b3(mdo sde): gis lung bstan thob gyur cig/ gser gyi lag pa'i dbang dang gser gyi 'od// bdag gi khye'u ni gang yin 'di gnyis kyang // der ni bu po de dag gnyis ka dang // byang chub bla med
400b4(mdo sde): lung bstan thob par shog/ sems cad gang dag gnas med rten med cing // skyabs dang bral nas 'phongs par gyur pa dag/ de dag la yang ma 'ongs dus rnams na// skye ba dang dpung //
400b5(mdo sde): gnyen skyabs dang rten gyur shog/ sdug bsngal kun 'byung zad par byed gyur cig/ bde ba kun gyi 'byung gnas 'gyur par shog/ sngon mtha' 'das pa de dag ji srid pa// mi 'ong
400b6(mdo sde): bskal par byang chub spyad par bgyi// gser 'od dam pa yi ni bshags pa yin// bdag gi sdig pa'i rgya mtsho skems par shog/ bdag gis las kyi rgya mtsho zad gyur cig/ bdag
400b7(mdo sde): mongs rgya mtsho zad par shog/ bdag gi bsod nams rgya mtsho rdzogs gyur cig/ ye shes dri med snang ba dam pa yis// bdag gi ye shes rgya mtsho rnam dag shog/ yon tan kun gyi rgya mtsho
401a1(mdo sde): 'gyur bar shog/ byang chub yon tan yon tan rin chen rdzogs// gser 'od dam pa'i bshags pa'i stobs kyis ni// bdag gis bsod nams rab tu snang bar shog
401a2(mdo sde): bdag gi byang chub snang ba rnam dag gyur// ye shes dri med snang ba dam pa yis// bdag gi lus kyi 'od ni snang bar shog/ bsod nas sa snang ba lhag ger bya ba'i phyir// 'jig rten gsum
401a3(mdo sde): na khyad par 'phags gyur cig/ bsod nams stobs dang rtag tu ldan par shog/ sdug bsngal rgya mtsho las ni sgrol ba dang // bde ba kun gyi rgya mtsho 'dra ba yis// ma 'ongs bskal par
401a4(mdo sde): byang chub spyad par bgyi// 'jig rten gsum na sngon mthar ji snyed gshegs// de dag zhing ni rgyal ba thams cad kyi// yon tan mtha' yas khyad 'phags ci 'dra ba// yon tan mtha' yas
401a5(mdo sde): rnams kyis bdag gi zhing // ma 'ongs dus na de 'drar 'gyur bar shog/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las// 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin
401a6(mdo sde): gshegs pa thams cad la bstod pa me tog pad+ma'i 'byung gnas zhes bya ba'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag/
401a7(mdo sde): gsungs so// bsam gyis mi khyab mdo rnams gzhan dag tu// stong pa'i chos rnams rab tu rgyas bshad de// de lta bas na mdo mchog dam pa 'dir// stong pa'i chos rnams mdo tsam
401b1(mdo sde): bshad pa yin// sems can blo chung rnam par mi shes pas// chos rnams thams cad shes par mi nus te// de lta ba na mdo mchog dam pa 'dir// stong pa'i chos rnams mdo tsam bshad
401b2(mdo sde): ba yin// sems can kun gyis ci nas shes 'gyur dang // sems can 'byung bya'i phyir ni snying rje'i dbang // thabs dang tshul dang rgyu gzhan rnams kyis ni// mdo mchog dam pa dbang po 'di/
401b3(mdo sde): bshad do// lus 'di grong khyim stong pa ji bzhin te// dbang po rnams ni dmig dang chom rkun 'dra// de dag thams can grong gcig gnas mod kyi// de dag phan tshun rnam par mi shes so//
401b4(mdo sde): mig gi dbang po gzugs gyur rnams la rgyug/ rna ba'i dbang po sgra la rnam par spyod// sna yi dbang po sna tshogs dri rnams 'phrog/ lce yi dbang po rtag tu ro la rgyug/ lus kyi dbang po reg pa//
401b5(mdo sde): dag la rgyu// yid kyi dbang po chos rnams rnam par spyod// dbang po drug po 'di dag phan tshun du// rang rang yul du rab tu 'jug par byed// sems ni rgyu ma bzhin du g.yo ba yin// dbang po drug ni
401b6(mdo sde): yul la rnam par spyod// ji ltar mi zhig grong stong rgyug pa dang // dmag dang chom rkun dag dang gnas pa bzhin// ji ltar sems ni yul drug gnas bcas shing // dbang po'i spyod yul dag
401b7(mdo sde): kyang rab tu shes// de ltar sems ni yul drug gnas bcas te// dbang po'i spyod yul rnams kyang rab shes te// gzugs dang sgra dang de bzhin dri rnams dang // ro dang reg bya de bzhin spyod
402a1(mdo sde): yul chos// sems ni dbang po drug po thams cad la// dbang por zhugs pa bya bzhin g.yo bar gyur// dbang po gang dang gang du gnas bcas pa// dbang po de ni
402a2(mdo sde): shes par bdag nyid byed// lus ni g.yo ba med cing byed pa med// snying po med cing rkyen las byung ba yin// yang dag ma yin yongs su rtogs las byung // grong stong las kyi 'khrul
402a3(mdo sde): 'khor 'dra ba gnas// sa dang me dang chu dang rlung rnams ni// grong gzhan gnas te phyogs dang phyogs na gnas// dper na sbrul gdug gnas gcig ji bzhin te// rtag tu phan tshun 'thun
402a4(mdo sde): pa ma yin bzhin// khams kyi sbrul rnams bzhi po de dag kyang // gnyis ni steng 'gro gnyis ni thur du 'gro// phyogs dang phyogs mtshams rnams su gnyis gnyis te// khams sbrul de dag/
402a5(mdo sde): thams can 'jig par 'gyur// sa yi sbrul dang chu yi sbrul dag dang // 'di gnyis 'og tu zad par 'gyur ba yin// me yau sbrul dang rlung gi sbrul dag dang // 'di gnyis steng gi nam mkhar
402a6(mdo sde): 'gro ba yin// ji ltar sngon chad byas pa'i las rnams kyis// sems dang rnam shes kun tu gnas nas dong // lha dang mi dang ngan song gsum dag tu// ji ltar byas pa'i las kyis srid par
402a7(mdo sde): skye// bad kan rlung dang mkhris pa zad gyur na// lus shig gcin dang ngan skyugs rnams kyis gang // mngon par mi dga' srin bu'i phung por 'gyur// dur khrod dag na 'thor ba shing bzhin gyur// lha
402b1(mdo sde): mo khyod ni chos 'di rnams la ltos// 'di la sems can de bzhin gang zag dang // chos rnams 'di dag thams cad stong pa ste// ma rig pa yi rkyen las byung ba yin// 'byung ba chen
402b2(mdo sde): po 'di dag che 'byung min// ma byung ba las byung zhing mi 'byung ste// gang gi phyir ni 'byung ba mi 'byung ba// de phyir 'byung ba che zhes ngas brjod do// ma rig pa ni gzhan yang yod min la//
402b3(mdo sde): ma rig pa yi rkyen las byung ba yin// ma rig pa 'di yod pa ma yin te// de bas ngas ni ma rig 'di bshad do// 'du byed rnam shes ming dang gzugs bcas dang // skye mched drug dang
402b4(mdo sde): reg dang tshor ba dang // sred dang len dang de bzhin srid pa dang // skye dang rga shi mya ngan gnod pa rnams// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal bsam gyis mi khyab pa// 'khor ba'i 'khor lo ji ltar gnas/
402b5(mdo sde): bdag/ ma byung ba las byung dang mi 'byung dang // tshul bzhin mo yin sems kyis rnams dpyad pa// bdag gis lta bar gyur pa bcad par gyis// ye shes ral gris nyon mongs rgya tshe drol//
402b6(mdo sde): phung po gnas la stong par gyur pa ltos// byang chub yon tan rgya chen reg par gyis// ngas ni bdud rtsi'i grong khyer sgo yang phye// bdud rtsi'i khu ba'i snod kyang kun tu bstan// nga ni
402b7(mdo sde): bdud rtsi'i grong khyer gnas der 'jug/ nga ni bdud rtsi'i khu bas bdag tshim bya// ngas ni chos kyi rnga chen dam pa brdungs// ngas ni chos kyi dung gi mchog kyang bus// ngas ni chos kyi
403a1(mdo sde): sgron ma mchog 'bar byas// ngas ni chos kyi char pa dam pa phab// nga ni nyon mongs dgra mchog rnams las rgyal// ngas ni chos kyi rgyal mtshan dam pa bsgreb/
403a2(mdo sde): srid pa'i mtsho las sems can rab tu bsgral// ngas ni ngan song gsum gyi lam rnams bkag/ sems can nyon mongs me yis gdungs gyur pa// rten med gyur cing dpung gnyen med pa/
403a3(mdo sde): dag/ srog chags nyon mongs sems gdungs zhi byas nas// bdud rtsi'i khu ba bsil bas tshim par byas// gang phyir bskal pa du ma sngon chad ngas// 'dren pa bsam mi khyab la mchod pa
403a4(mdo sde): byas// chos kyi sku de yongs su tshol ba na// brtul zhugs brtan pas byang chub phyir spyad de// lag pa dang ni mig dang rkang pa dang // yan lag mchog dang bu sdug bu mo dang // nor dbyig nor bu
403a5(mdo sde): mu tig rgyan dang gser// bai DUR+Ya dang rin chen sna tshogs btang // stong gsum shing ljon thams cad dang // rtswa dang rtswa rnams thams cad dang // nags tshal dag dang sa las ni// 'khrungs
403a6(mdo sde): pa thams cad bcad gtubs te// de dag thams cad phyir brlags nas// rab tu phra ba'i rdul 'drar byas// nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor ji tsam par// phyi ma'i phung po spungs nas ni/
403a7(mdo sde): 'di la cha gsum dbye ba nus// sa la rdul ni yod pa rnams// stong gsum dag ni thams cad kyi// rdul khams bsam gyis mi khyab pa// sems can kun gyi shes pa gang // de ni
403b1(mdo sde): sems can gcig gir gyur// shes pa de yis rdul rnams kyi// phye ma bgrang bar byed na ni// sems can kun las rab 'phags pa// ye shes rab ldan mi rnams kyis// thams/
403b2(mdo sde): cad bgrang bar nus srid kyi// rgyal ba'i mkhyen la mi nus so// thub pa chen po'i ye shes gang // skad cig gcig la 'jug pa yang // bskal pa bye ba du mar ni// gang du'ang bgrang
403b3(mdo sde): bar mi nus so// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las// stong pa nyid kyi le'u zhes bya ba ste drug pa'o// // de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang
403b4(mdo sde): rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung dang / rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po dang / rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig la bgos nas/ pus mo g.yas
403b5(mdo sde): pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lo gos su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gser
403b6(mdo sde): 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gzigs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa
403b7(mdo sde): thams cad kyis dgongs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad kyis yongs su bzung ba/ lha'i tshogs thams cad kyis phyag bgyis pa/ lha'i tshogs thams cad kyis mchod pa
404a1(mdo sde): lha'i dbang po'i tshogs thams cad kyis mngon par bstod pa/ 'jig rten skyong ba thams cad kyis mchod cing bsngags te brjod nas rab tu bkur ba
404a2(mdo sde): lha'i khang khyim thams cad snang bar bgyid pa/ sems can thams cad mchog tu bde ba rab tu sbyin par bgyid pa/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin
404a3(mdo sde): rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal thams cad skems pa/ 'jigs pa thams cad kyi rgyun gcod do// pha rol gyi dmag tshogs thams cad rab tu zlog pa/ mu ge'i dgon pa thams
404a4(mdo sde): cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa/ nad kyi dgon pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa/ bza' thams cad sel ba/ mchog tu zhi bar bgyid pa/ mya ngan dang nyon mongs pa thams cad rab tu
404a5(mdo sde): zhi bar bgyid pa/ gnod pa rnam pa sna tshogs rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa/ gnod pa brgya stong rab tu 'joms par bgyid pa lags so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang
404a6(mdo sde): po'i rgyal po 'di 'khor gyi nang du rgya cher yang dag par bshad na/ chos nyan pa chos bdud rtsi'i khu ba 'dis bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang g.yog dang bcas pa bzhi lha'i lus 'di gzi brjid
404a7(mdo sde): chen pos rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro// bdag cag gi lus la brtson pa dang / stobs dang / mthu yang skyed par 'gyur/ gzi brjid dang / dpal dang / phun sum tshogs pa'ang bdag cag gi lus
404b1(mdo sde): la 'jug par 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi ni chos dang ldan pa/ chos smra ba/ chos kyi rgyal po lags te/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag
404b2(mdo sde): ni chos kyis lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / dri za dang / mi'i ma ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyi rgyal po bgyi'o// 'byung po'i tshogs mi bzad pa/
404b3(mdo sde): snying rje ma mchis pa gzhan gyi mdangs 'phrog pa rnams bzlog par bgyi'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad
404b4(mdo sde): dang / gnod sbyin brgya stong phrag du ma dang lhan cig tu/ rtag par rgyun du lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi'i las 'das pas 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad la blta bar bgyi/ bsrung
404b5(mdo sde): bar bgyi/ yongs su bskyang bar bgyi ste/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi 'jig rten skyong ba zhes ming du chags so// btsun pa bcom ldan
404b6(mdo sde): 'das gang su dag 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis yul 'joms par 'gyur ram/ mu ge'i dgon pa'am/ nad kyi dgon pa 'am/ gnod pa sna tshogs brgya dang
404b7(mdo sde): gnod pa stong dang / gnod pa brgya phrag stong gis gtsas par 'gyur ba na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhis/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang
405a1(mdo sde): po'i rgyal po 'di 'dzin pa'i dge slong chos smra ba de dag la bskul bar bgyi'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das nam bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhis rdzu 'phrul/
405a2(mdo sde): dang byin gyi rlabs kyis dge slong chos smra ba de dag bskul ba na/ yul gang dang gang du mchi bar gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di yul de dang de dag tu rgyu cher yang dag
405a3(mdo sde): par ston par 'gyur te/ gang gnod pa sna tshogs brgya dang / gnod pa stong yul du 'byung ba 'di lta bu 'di dag rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mo'i rgyal po gang gi
405a4(mdo sde): yul du mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa'i dge slong chos smra ba de dag mchis par 'gyur ba'i yul de dag tu gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di yang bsnyen par 'gyur ro// btsun pa/
405a5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das mi'i rgyal pos gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di mnyan te/ thos nas mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa'i dge slong dag phyir rgol ba thams cad las kun tu
405a6(mdo sde): srung bar bgyid/ yongs su sgrub pa dang / yongs su 'dzin pa dang / yongs su skyong bar bgyid na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po bzhis mi'i rgyal po de'i yul thams cad na/
405a7(mdo sde): gnas pa'i sems can rnams kun tu bsrung bar bgyi/ yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur
405b1(mdo sde): bar bgyi'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mi'i rgyal pos nam dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa la bde bar sbyar ba thams cad/
405b2(mdo sde): kyis bde bar bgyid na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhis mi'i rgyal po de'i yul thams cad na gnas pa'i sems cad rnams la bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyi ba
405b3(mdo sde): ba dang / yo byad thams cad phun sum tshogs par bgyi'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das nam mi'i rgyal pos dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i
405b4(mdo sde): dbang po 'dzin pa dag la bsti stang bgyid/ bla mar bgyid/ rim gror bgyid cing mchod na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhis mi'i rgyal po de la/ rgyal po thams
405b5(mdo sde): cad pas ches bsti stang du bgyi/ ches bla mar bgyi/ ches rim gror bgyi/ ches mchod par bgyi ste/ yul thams cad du yang rab tu bsngags par bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das
405b6(mdo sde): kyis rgyal po chen po bzhi la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ rgyal po chen po dag legs so legs so// rgyal po chen po khyed yang legs so legs so// 'di lta ste/ khyed ni sngon gyi
405b7(mdo sde): rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed pa/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po la bsnyen bkur byas la chos dang ldan pa/ chos smra ba/ chos
406a1(mdo sde): kyi rgyal po// chos kyis lha dang mi rnams kyi rgyal po byed pa'o// 'di lta ste/ khyed ni yun ring por sems can thams cad la phan pa'i sems dang ldan pa
406a2(mdo sde): bde ba dang byams pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde bar bya ba'i lhag pa'i bsam pa la zhugs pa/ mi phan pa thams cad 'gog pa/ sems
406a3(mdo sde): can thams cad la bde ba thams cad nye bar bsgrubs la brtson pa yin te// rgyal po chen po khyed bzhis mi'i rgyal po gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di la mchod pa dang
406a4(mdo sde): rim gro byed par brtson pa de dag la kun tu bsrung ba gyis shig/ yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / chad pa spyang pa dang / zhi ba dang bde legs su
406a5(mdo sde): 'gyur bar gyis shig/ de nas rgyal po chen po dpung dang / g.yog dang / gnod sbyin brgya stong phrag du ma dang bcas pa khyed bzhes 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i
406a6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos kyi tshul kun tu srung bar 'gyur ro// yongs su sgrub pa dang / yongs su gzung bar yang 'gyur ro// de nas rgyal po chen po dpung dang / g.yog dang /
406a7(mdo sde): gnod sbyin 'bum phrag du ma dang bcas pa khyed bzhi lha dang lha ma yin dang g.yul 'gyed pa na rgyal bar 'gyur ro// lha ma yin rnams 'pham par 'gyur ro// 'di ltar gser 'od dam pa
406b1(mdo sde): mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po pha rol gyi dmag tshogs thams cad 'dul bar byed pa 'di'i phyir dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin
406b2(mdo sde): pa de dag la kun tu bsrung ba gyis shes/ yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur bar gyis shig/
406b3(mdo sde): de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang / rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung dang / rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po dang / rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang stan las langs te
406b4(mdo sde): gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das 'di
406b5(mdo sde): skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ ljongs
406b6(mdo sde): sam/ yul 'khor tam/ pho brang 'khor gang du spyod par 'gyur ba dang / mi'i rgyal po gang dang gang gi yul du spyod par 'gyur ba dang / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mi'i rgyal por 'gyur ba
406b7(mdo sde): gang la la zhig lha'i dbang po'i dam tshig rgyal po'i bstan bcos 'dis rgyal po bgyid cing / rtag par rgyun du gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan tam/ rim gro bgyid dam
407a1(mdo sde): mchod pa bgyid dam/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'dzin pa de dag la yang bsti stang bgyid//
407a2(mdo sde): btsun par bgyid/ rim gror bgyid cing mchod de/ rtag par rgyun du gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po nyan na/ chos nyan pa'i chu bo'i chu chos bdud rtsi'i khu ba 'dis
407a3(mdo sde): bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / dpung dang / g.yog dang / gnod sbyin brgya stong phrag du ma'i lha'i lus 'di dag gzi brjid chen po rnam par 'brel bar 'gyur/ bdag cag la
407a4(mdo sde): brtson 'grus dang / mthu dang / stobs chen por yang bgyid par 'gyur/ bdag cag gi gzi brjid dang / dpal dang / phun sum tshogs pa yang rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro// btsun/
407a5(mdo sde): pabacom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa/ gnod sbyin brgya stong phrag du ma dang lus bltar mi gda' bar bgyis te/ da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus
407a6(mdo sde): na grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ ljongs sam/ yul 'khor ram/ pho brang 'khor gang na/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di spyod par 'gyur ba de dag tu mchi bar
407a7(mdo sde): bgyi'o// mi'i rgyal po gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan pa dang / rim gro bgyid pa dang / mchod pa bgyid pa de dag la kun tu bsrung bar bgyi'o// yongs su bskyab pa dang /
407b1(mdo sde): yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyi'o// rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor de dag dang / yul 'khor de dag dang
407b2(mdo sde): yul de dag kyang kun tu bsrung bar bgyi'o// yongs su bsgrub pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyi'o//
407b3(mdo sde): yul de dag kyang 'jigs pa dang / gnod pa dang / 'khrug pa thams cad las yongs su thar par bgyi'o// pha rol gyi dmag tshogs rnams kyang bzlog par bgyi'o// mi'i rgyal po gang
407b4(mdo sde): la la gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan pa dang / rim gror bgyid pa dang / mchod pa bgyid pa de'i dgra zla 'ad ba nye ba'i rgyal po gzhan zhig mchis la/ btsun pa/
407b5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das nam dgra zla 'dab nye ba de'i rgyal po de 'di snyam du bdag dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa dang lhan cig tu yul der song ste/ yul de rnam par gzhig go snyam du/
407b6(mdo sde): sems bskyed na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de'i tshe de'i dus na gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di'i gzi brjid kyi mthus/ dgra zla 'dab nye ba'i rgyal po de rgyal po
407b7(mdo sde): gzhan dag dong g.yul 'byed par 'gyur/ rang gi yul du phyin na yang yul 'khrug par 'gyur/ rgyal po'i 'khrug pa mi bzad pa yang 'byung bar 'gyur/ yul du gza' dang nad kyang 'byung
408a1(mdo sde): bar 'gyur/ yul du brel ba sna tshogs brgya dag kyang 'byung bar 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das nam dgra zla 'dab nye ba'i rgyal po rang gi yul du phyin na gnod/
408a2(mdo sde): pa sna tshogs brgya dang / khrel ba sna tshogs brgya 'di lta bu 'byung ngo // btsun pa bcom ldan 'das dgra zla 'dang nye ba'i rgyal po de yan lag bzhi pa'i dmag sogs te/ pha rol gyi dmag chogs
408a3(mdo sde): su mchi ba'i slad du rang gi yul nis byung ste/ dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa dang lhan cig tu yul der mchi 'tshal ba dang / gang na gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di gnas
408a4(mdo sde): pa'i yul de rnam par gzhig 'tshal bar gyur na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa/ gnod sbyin brgya stong du ma dang lhan cig tu lus mi
408a5(mdo sde): gda' bar bgyis te der mchi bar bgyi'o// pha rol gyi dmag tshogs de shul du zhugs pa las kyang de nyid nas ldog par bgyi'o// brel ba sna tshogs brgya dag kyang nye bar bsgrub par bgyi'o//
408a6(mdo sde): gegs kyang bgyi'o// 'di lta ste/ yul der pha rol gyi dmag tshogs de mchi ba yang mi nus na/ yul gzhig par bgyid pa ltag la 'gyur/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po
408a7(mdo sde): bzhi po dag la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ rgyal po chen po dag legs so legs so// rgyal po chen po dag khyed yang legs te/ khyed bskal pa grangs med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya
408b1(mdo sde): stong du bsgrubs pa/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di'i phyir mi'i rgyal po gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan pa dang / ri mo byed pa dang / mchod
408b2(mdo sde): pa de dag la kun tu bsrung bar gyis shig/ yongs su bskyab po dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang gzhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur bar
408b3(mdo sde): gyis shig/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor de dag dang / grong khyer de dag dang / yul 'khor de dag dang / yul de dag kyang kun tu srungs shig/ yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su
408b4(mdo sde): gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur bar gyis shig/ yul de dag kyang 'jigs pa dang / gnod pa dang
408b5(mdo sde): 'khrug pa thams cad las yong su thar par gyis shig/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs rnams kyang zlog cig/ 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad na gnas pa'i mi'i rgyal po dag mi 'thab pa
408b6(mdo sde): dang / mtshang mi 'dru ba dang / mi rtsod pa dang / mi 'gyed par bya ba la spro bar gyis shig/ rgyal po chen po dpung dang g.yog tu gcas pa khyed bzhis 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir nam grong khyer
408b7(mdo sde): brgyad khri bzhi stong de dag na/ rgyal po brgyad khri bzhi stong de dag rang rang gi yul la mngon par dga' ba dang / rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug des mngon par dga' ba dang / rang gi nor gyi phung pos phan//
409a1(mdo sde): tshun rnam par mi 'tshe ba dang / phan tshun rnam par 'tshe ba mi bskyed pa dang / rang gis ji ltar sngon gyi las bsags pas rgyal po thob pa'i rang gi rgyal srid kyi dbang
409a2(mdo sde): phyug gis dga' ba dang / phan tshun du yul 'jig par mi byed pa dang / yul gzhig po'i phyir pha rol gyi gnod pa dag na me 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir grong khyer brgyad khri bzhi stong dag na/ rgyal po
409a3(mdo sde): brgyad khri bzhi stong de dag phan tshun du byams pa'i sems su 'gyur/ byams pa'i sems dang phan pa'i sems su 'gyur te phan tshun du mi 'thab/ mtshang mi 'dru/ mi rtsod
409a4(mdo sde): mi 'gyed par rang rang gi yul dag na dga' bar 'gyur na/ de'i phyir rgyal po chen po dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa khyed bzhis 'dzam bu'i gling 'di rgyas par 'gyur/ lo legs par
409a5(mdo sde): 'gyur/ nyams dga' bar 'gyur/ skye bo mang po dang mis gang bar 'gyur/ sa yang mdangs can du 'gyur/ dus dang / zla ba dang / zla ba phyed dang / lo khyud 'khor thams cad kyang dag pa'i
409a6(mdo sde): dus dang ldan par 'gyur/ gza' dang / rgyu skar dang / zla ba dang / nyi ma yang nyin mtshan du legs par rgyu bar 'gyur/ char pa'i rgyun kyang sa la dus dus su 'bab par 'gyur/ 'dzam buni
409a7(mdo sde): gling thams cad na gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyang nor dang 'bru thams cad 'byor par 'gyur/ longs spyod che ba dang ser sna med par 'gyur/ gtong ba dang ldan par 'gyur/ dge ba
409b1(mdo sde): bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan par 'gyur/ phal cher bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur/ lha'i khang khyim rnams kyang lha dang lha'i bu rnams kyis gang bar 'gyur ro// rgyal po chen
409b2(mdo sde): po dag grang la la zhig mi'i rgyal por gyur lA/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan par 'gyur te// rim gro byas/ mchod pa byas/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am
409b3(mdo sde): dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'dzin pa de dag la yang bsti stang byed/ bla mar byed/ rim gro byed/ mchod pa byed cing rgyal po chen po khyed bzhi dpung dang g.yog
409b4(mdo sde): tu bcas pa/ gnod sbyin brgya stong phrag du ma la snying brtse ba'i phyir rtag par rgyun du gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan na/ chos mnyan pa'i chu'i klung bdud rtsi'i khu ba
409b5(mdo sde): 'dis khyed cag gi lus 'di dag tshim par 'gyur ro// khyed kyi lha'i lusa'i de dag gi gzi brjid chen po yang rnam par 'phel lo// khyed kyi brtson 'grus dang / mthu dang / stobs kyang
409b6(mdo sde): skyed do// khyed gzi brjid dang / dpal dang / phun sum tshogs pa yang rnam par 'phel lo// mi'i rgyal po des de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
409b7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas shAkya thub pang la yang mchod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa rgya chen po yangs pa byas par 'gyur ro// mi'i rgyal po des 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs
410a1(mdo sde): pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma la yang yo byad bsam gyis mi khyab pa che ba yangs pa thams cad kyis mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro// des na mi'i rgyal po de la bsrung
410a2(mdo sde): ba chen po byas par 'gyur ro// des na mi'i rgyal po de la kun tu bsrung ba dang / yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang /
410a3(mdo sde): zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur ba byas par 'gyur ro// btsun mo dam pa dang / rgyal po rnams dang / btsun mo'i 'khor thams cad dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor thams cad/
410a4(mdo sde): kyang bsrung ba chen po byas par 'gyur/ yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyong ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur ba byas par
410a5(mdo sde): 'gyur/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor na gnas pa'i lha thams cad kyang ches gzi brjid dang ldan pa dang / ches stobs dang ldan pa dang / bde ba dang / yid bde ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan
410a6(mdo sde): par 'gyur/ dga' ba sna tshogs myong bar 'gyur/ grong khyer de dag dang / yul 'khor de dag kyang kun tu srung bar 'gyur/ yongs su bskyang bar 'gyur ba/ gnod pa med par 'gyur
410a7(mdo sde): dgra med par 'gyur/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs thams cad kyis mi brdzi ba dang / gnod pa med pa dang / 'khrug pa med par 'gyur ro// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan
410b1(mdo sde): 'dus la/ rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang / rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung dang / rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po dang / rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang de dag gis 'di skad ces
410b2(mdo sde): gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mi'i rgyal po gang la la zhig gser 'ad dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di yang nyan 'tshal bar 'gyur/ bdag nyid la yang bsrung ba chen
410b3(mdo sde): po bgyid 'tshal bar 'gyur/ btsun mo dam pa dang / rgyal bu rnams dang / rgyal po'i bu mo rnams dang / btsun mo'i 'khor gyi tshogs rnams la'ang bsrung ba chen po bgyid
410b4(mdo sde): 'tshal bar 'gyur/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor de dag thams cad la yang zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur ba chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa mchog tu khyad par du 'phags pa bla na med pa bgyis
410b5(mdo sde): 'tshal bar 'gyur/ tshe 'di la bdag gi rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnam par 'bel bar bgyid 'tshal bar 'gyur/ rgyal po nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan
410b6(mdo sde): par gyur/ bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu ma mchis pa yongs su 'dzin 'tshal bar gyur/ bdag gi yul thams cad kyang kun tu bsrung 'tshal bar gyur/ yongs su bskyang 'tshe
410b7(mdo sde): bar gyur/ rang gi yul na gnod pa ma mchis pa dang / dgra ma mchis pa dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis mi brdzi ba dang / nad 'go ba ma mchis pa dang / 'khrug pa ma mchis
411a1(mdo sde): bar bgyid 'tshal bar gyur na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mi'i rgyal po des g.yeng ba ma mchis pa'i sems dang / gus pa dang bcas pa dang ka ri mo dang bcas/
411a2(mdo sde): pas gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di bsti sbyang du bgyis te mnyan par bgyi'o// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di mnyan pa'i slad du/ mi'i rgyal po//
411a3(mdo sde): des rgyal po'i pho brang khyad par du 'phags par mchi bar bgyi'o// der mchis nas kyang rgyal po'i pho brang spos chab sna tshogs kyis chag chag gdab cing me tog gi sil ma sna tshogs
411a4(mdo sde): dgram par bgyi'o// spos chab sna tshogs kyis chag chag btab pa der chos kyi khri mthon po rgyan sna tshogs kyis legs par brgyan par bsham par bgyi'o// phyogs der gdugs dang
411a5(mdo sde): rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan sna tshogs legs par brgyan par bgyi'o// mi'i rgyal po des lus bkru bar bgyi'o// gos dri rab tu bda' ba gos gsar pa mdzes pa bgos nas rgyan sna
411a6(mdo sde): tshogs kyis brgyan par bgyi'o// bdag gi stan rab tu dmya' ba gding bar bgyi ste/ stan de la mchis nas rgyal po'i rgyags pas dregs par mi bgyi'o// der rgyal srid kyi dbang
411a7(mdo sde): phyug la chags par mi bgyi'o// rgyags pa dang / nga rgyal dang / dregs pa thams cad rnam par spangs pa'i sems kyis gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di mnyan
411b1(mdo sde): bar bgyi'o// dge slong chos smra ba de la yang ston par 'du shes bskyed par bgyi'o// mi'i rgyal po des de'i tshe de'i dus na btsun mo dam pa dang / rgyal bu rnams dang / rgyal po/
411b2(mdo sde): bu mo rnams dang / btsun mo'i 'khor gyi tshogs rnams la sdug pa dang phan pas blta bar bgyi'o// btsun mo dam pa dang / rgyal bu rnams dang / rgyal po'i bu mo rnams la tshig
411b3(mdo sde): snyan pa smra bar bgyi'o// btsun mo'i 'khor gyi tshogs thams cad la yang tshig snyan pa smra bar bgyi'o// chos mnyan pa'i mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs sbyor du skul bar bgyi'o//
411b4(mdo sde): dga' ba bsam mi khyab cing mtshungs pa ma mchis pas bdag tshim par bgyi'o// dga' ba dang bde ba bsam gyis mi khyab par bde bar bgyi'o// dbang po bde bar bgyi'o// bdag nyid
411b5(mdo sde): don chen po thob par bsam par bgyi'o// bdag dga' ba chen pos dga' bar bgyi'o// rab tu dga' ba chen po bskyed nas chos smra ba bsu bar bgyi'o// de skad ces gsol pa
411b6(mdo sde): dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ rgyal po chen po bzhi la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rgyal po chen po dag de'i tshe de'i dus na mi'i rgyal po des gos thams cad dkar po gsar pa mdzes
411b7(mdo sde): pa bgo bar bya'o// spud pa dang rgyan sna tshogs kyis bdag legs par brgyan par bya'o// de'i phyir gdugs dkar po yang gzung bar bya'o// rgyal po'i mthu chen po dang / rgyal po'i bkod pa
412a1(mdo sde): chen po bkra shis tha dad pa sna tshogs thogs te/ rgyal po'i pho brang de nas byung la chos smra ba bsra pa'i phyir der 'gro bar bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mi'i rgyal pos der
412a2(mdo sde): gom pa ji snyed por bde snyed kyi bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi 'khor ba phyir snyil bar 'gyur/ de snyed kyi 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal rigs bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong thob par 'gyur/ der dgom
412a3(mdo sde): ba ji snyed por de snyed du/ tshe 'di la rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'phel bar 'gyur/ bskal po bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mar gnas yangs shing rgya che ba lnga'i
412a4(mdo sde): gzhal med khang rin po che sna bdun las byas pa dag thob par 'gyur/ mi rnams kyi rgyal rigs lha'i rgya che zhing rgya che ba brgya stong phrag du ma thob par 'gyur// skye ba thams cad du dbang phyug chen po/
412a5(mdo sde): thob par 'gyur/ tshe ring bar 'gyur/ yun ring du 'tsho bar 'gyur/ spobs pa dang ldan par 'gyur/ tshig gzung bar 'os par 'gyur/ grags pa dang ldan par 'gyur/ brjod pa shan tu rgya che bar
412a6(mdo sde): 'gyur/ bsngags par 'os par 'gyur/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten la phan par 'gyur/ lha dang mi rnams kyi bde ba rgya che zhing rgya che ba thob par 'gyur/ stobs che
412a7(mdo sde): bar 'gyur/ chen po che chen po'i stobs kyi shugs dang ldan zhing / gzugs bzang bar 'gyur/ mdzes pa dang / blta na sdug pa dang / kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan par 'gyur/
412b1(mdo sde): skye ba thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa dang phrad par 'gyur/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams rnyed par 'gyur/ bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu med pa yongs su gzung bar 'gyur te/
412b2(mdo sde): rgyal po chen po yon tan gyi phan yon 'di lta bu 'di dag mthong nas/ mi'i rgyal po des dpag tshad tsam du chos smrab bsu bar bya/ dpag tshad brgya dang / dpag tshad stong du yang bsu bar bya/
412b3(mdo sde): chos smra ba de la ston par 'du shes bskyed par bya'o// 'di snyam du yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa deng bdag gi rgyal po'i pho brang 'dir
412b4(mdo sde): 'jug par 'gyur ro// deng de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa bdag gi rgyal po'i pho brang 'dir bshos gsol bar 'gyur ro// deng bdag
412b5(mdo sde): gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa'i chos 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun pa mnyan par bya'o// deng bdag chos mnyan pa 'dis bla
412b6(mdo sde): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par bya'o// deng bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma mnyes par byas par 'gyur ro// deng
412b7(mdo sde): bdag gis 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mchod pa chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa yangs shing rgya che ba byas par 'gyur ro//
413a1(mdo sde): deng bdag gis sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal thams cad shin tu rgyun chad par 'gyur ro// deng bdag/
413a2(mdo sde): gis tshangs pa'i dbang po'i rgyal po nyid kyi lus bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma 'thob pa dag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sa bon bskyed par 'gyur ro// deng bdag gis brgya byin nyid kyi lus
413a3(mdo sde): bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma 'thob pa dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sa bon bskyed par 'gyur ro// deng bdag gis 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po nyid kyi lus bye ba khrag khrig brgya brgya stong phrag du/
413a4(mdo sde): ma 'thob pa dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur ro// deng bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mar 'khor ba las yongs su thar par byas par 'gyur ro// deng bdag gis bsod nams kyi
413a5(mdo sde): phung po dpag tu med pa/ bla na med pa yangs shing rgya che ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su gzung bar 'gyur ro// deng bdag gis btsun mo'i 'khor gyi tshogs thams cad la bsrung ba chen po byas
413a6(mdo sde): par 'gyur ro// deng bdag gis rgyal po'i pho brang 'dir zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa mchog tu 'phags pa bla na med pa byas par 'gyur ro// deng bdag gis yul 'di
413a7(mdo sde): thams cad kun tu bsrungs par 'gyur ro// yongs su bskyangs pa dang / gnod pa med pa dang / dgra med pa dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs thams cad kyis mi brdzi ba dang / nad 'go ba med pa dang / 'khrug
413b1(mdo sde): ba med par 'gyur ro snyam du sems bskyed par bya'o// rgyal po chen po dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'dzin padag
413b2(mdo sde): la mi'i rgyal po de dag chos la gus po 'di lta bus bsti stang byed/ bla mar byed/ rim gro byed/ mchod pa byed cing / rgyal po chen po khyed bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa dang / lha'i tshogs de dag dang /
413b3(mdo sde): gnod sbyin brgya stong phrag du ma dag la shas kyi dam pa byin na/ mi'i rgyal po de bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa dang / dge ba mngon par 'du byed pa de dang / tshe 'di'i lus kyi rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug
413b4(mdo sde): chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa des rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro// tshe 'di la rgyal po'i gzi brjid chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro// dpal dang phun sum tshogs pa dang / gzi
413b5(mdo sde): brjid kyis kyang brgyan par 'gyur ro// phyir rgol ba thams cad dang / dgra thams cad chos dang mthun pas shin tu tshar gcod par 'gyur ro// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan
413b6(mdo sde): 'das la/ rgyal po chen po bzhi po de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig mi'i rgyal por gyur la/ de chos la gus pa de lta bus gser 'od dam pa ma
413b7(mdo sde): sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po nyan la/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'dzin pa de dag la yang bsti stang bgyid/ bla mar bgyid
414a1(mdo sde): rim gror bgyid/ mchod par bgyid cing / rgyal po chen po bdag cag gi slad du rgyal po'i pho brang de shin tu dag par phyag bdar bgyid/ spos chab sna tshogs kyis chug chag
414a2(mdo sde): legs par 'debs la/ bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dang lhan cig thun mong du chos mnyan pa de nyan cing / bdag dang lha thams cad kyi slad du dge ba'i rtsa ba'i shas cung zad cig sbyin pa
414a3(mdo sde): bgyid na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das dge slong chos smra ba de chos kyi stan la mchis ma thag tu mi'i rgyal po des bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi'i don gyi slad du spos chub sna tshogs kyis
414a4(mdo sde): bdug par bgyi'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po de la mchod pa'i slad du bdug pas bdugs ma thag tu spros sna tshogs rnams las
414a5(mdo sde): spos dang / bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khri shing dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la rgyal po chen po bzhi bdag cag bzhi'i rang rang gi khang pa'i steng gi bar snang
414a6(mdo sde): la spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khri shing dag gi gdugs rnams su gnas par 'gyur/ spos dri rgya chen po yang mnam par 'gyur/ gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i snang ba 'byung bar 'gyur
414a7(mdo sde): zhing / snang ba des bdag cag gi khang pa rnams kyang snang ba bgyis par 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khri shing dag skad cig thang cig yud
414b1(mdo sde): tsam de la mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang / lha mo chen mo dbyangs can dang / lha mo chen po brtan ma dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po yang dag shes
414b2(mdo sde): dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po dang / gnod sbyir gyi sde dpon po lag ra rdo rje dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nor bu bzang dang / 'phrog
414b3(mdo sde): ma bu lnga brgya'i 'khor dang ldan pa dang / klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa dang / klu'i rgyal po chen po rgya mtsho dang / de dag rang rang gi khang pa'i steng gi bar snang la byung ste/ spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khri
414b4(mdo sde): shing gi gdugs rnams su gnas par 'gyur ro// spos dri sna tshogs rgya chen po yang mnam par 'gyur/ khang pa rnams kyi nang du gser du snang ba 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / snang ba des gnas pa
414b5(mdo sde): thams cad snang ba bgyis par 'gyur ro// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ rgyal po chen po bzhi la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rgyal po chen po dag rgyal po chen po khyed
414b6(mdo sde): bzhi'i rang rang gi khang pa rnams kyi steng gi bar snang la spros dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khri shing de dag gdugs rnams su gnas par ma zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rgyal po chen po dag mi'i rgyal/
414b7(mdo sde): po des gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di la mchod pa'i phyir spos sna tshogs de dag gis bdugs ma thag tu lag na pog snod cig thogs pa de las spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi/
415a1(mdo sde): 'khri shing rnams byung bar gyur te/ de skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad na gang na zlab bye ba phrag brgya dang
415a2(mdo sde): nyi ma byed zag brgya dang / rgya mtsho chen po bye ba phrag brgya dang / ri'i rgyal po ri rab bye ba phrag brgya dang / ri'i rgyal po khor yug dang / khor yug chen po bye ba phrag brgya dang / gling bzhi pa chen po'i
415a3(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba phrag brgya dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha bye ba phrag brgya dang / sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha bye ba phrag brgya nas/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min du nye bar song ba'i
415a4(mdo sde): bar gyi lha bye ba phrag brgya dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad du sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i ris bye ba phrag brgya po thams cad na lha dang / klu dang / gnod
415a5(mdo sde): sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po'i tshogs rnams kyis rang rang gi khang pa dag gi steng gi bar snang la spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs
415a6(mdo sde): kyi 'khri shing de dag gdugs rnams su gnas par 'gyur/ spos dri rgya chen po yang mnam par 'gyur/ lha'i khang pa rnams su gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i snang ba yang 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / snang
415a7(mdo sde): bdas kyang lha'i khang pa rnams snang bar byas par 'gyur ro// rgyal po chen po dag stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jog rten gyi khams na/ lha'i khang pa thams cad kyi steng gi ba'i snang la smos das
415b1(mdo sde): bdug pa'i 'khri shing de dag gdugs rnams su gnas pa de bzhin du/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di la mchod pa'i phyir/ mi'i rgyal po des spos chab sna tshogs de
415b2(mdo sde): dag gis bdugs ma thag tu gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di'i gzi brjid kyi mthus spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khri shing dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag skad cig thang
415b3(mdo sde): cig yud tsam de la kun tu phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams du ma gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong rnams su/ de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag
415b4(mdo sde): khrig brgya stong phrag du ma la gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gi bar snang la spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khri shing rnams su gnas par 'gyur/ de dag kyang sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya
415b5(mdo sde): stong phrag du ma la/ spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs rgya che zhing rgya che ba mnam par 'gyur/ gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i snang ba 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / snang ba des sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig
415b6(mdo sde): brgya stong phrag du ma gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag snang bar byas par 'gyur ro// rgyal po chen po dag cho 'phrul de lta bu de dag byeng ma thag tu/ de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrig khrig brgya stong phrag du
415b7(mdo sde): ma gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag chos smra ba de la dgongs par 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa legs so legs so// skyes bu dam pa khyed gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po tshul 'di lta bu/ zam
416a1(mdo sde): mo'i don 'di lta bu/ zab mor snang ba 'di lta bu yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa 'di lta bu 'di rgya cher yang dag par rab tu 'chad par 'dod pa lteng
416a2(mdo sde): yang legs so legs so zhes bya ba sbyin par 'gyur ro// su tha na gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan pa'i sems can de dag kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba ngan ngon dang ldan par mi
416a3(mdo sde): 'gyur na/ gang dag 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / 'chad pa dang / klog pa dang / kun chud par byed pa dang / 'khor la rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de ci
416a4(mdo sde): phyir zhe na/ skyes bu dam pa gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di thos ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma bla na med pa yang dag par
416a5(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// / 'phags pa gsor 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po zhes bya ba theg pa chen/
416a6(mdo sde): po'i mdobam po gsum pa/ de nas phyogs bcu kun tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa byed
416a7(mdo sde): zag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi ning na bzhugs pa dag gis de'i tsha 'i dus ni tshig gcig dang ngag gcig dang / sgra skad gcig gis dge slong chos smra ba/ chos
416b1(mdo sde): stan la 'dug pa de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// skyes bu dam pa khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus na byang chub kyi snying por 'gro bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod byang chub kyi snying po mchog dam
416b2(mdo sde): par song ste shing gi rgyal po'i drung du 'dug nas/ 'jig rten gsum po thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa sems can thams cad las rab tu 'das pa'i brtul zhugs dang / dka'
416b3(mdo sde): thub spyod pa'i stobs skyed pa'i byin gyi rlabs dka' ba spyod pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma dag ston par 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod byang chub kyi snying po legs par brgyan par byed par 'gyur/
416b4(mdo sde): skyes bu dam pa khyod stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad yongs su skyob par 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod shing gi rgyal po'i drung du 'dug ste/ bdud kyi sde bsam gyis
416b5(mdo sde): mi khyab pa gzugs rab tu 'jigs 'jigs ltar 'dug pa/ mi sdug pa ston pa gzugs mi sdug pa sna tshogs dag las rgyal bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod byang chub kyi snying po mchog
416b6(mdo sde): dam par song ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dpe med pa rab tu zhi ba rdul dang bral ba/ zab mo mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod rdo rje'i
416b7(mdo sde): gdan snying po brtan pa la 'dug ste/ chos kyi 'khor lo rgyal ba thams cad kyis mngon par bstod pa/ mchog tu zab pa/ bla na med pa rnam pa bcu gnyis su rab tu skor bar 'gyur/
417a1(mdo sde): skyes bu dam pa khyod chos kyi rnga chen po bla na med par rdung bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod chos kyi dung bla na med pa 'bud par 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod chos kyi rgyal
417a2(mdo sde): mtshan chen po sgreng bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod chos kyi sgron ma bla na med pa 'bar bar byed par 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod chos kyi char bla na med pa 'bebs par 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod//
417a3(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa'i dgra stong phrag du ma las rgyal bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod sems can bye bo khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma shin tu 'jigs su rung ba 'jigs pa chen po
417a4(mdo sde): rgya mtsho las sgrol bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma dag 'khor ba'i 'khor lo las yongs su thar par byed par 'gyur/ skye
417a5(mdo sde): bladam pa khyod sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrog brgya stong brag du ma dag mnyes par byed par 'gyur ro// de skad ces bka' stsal padung / bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyam po chen po mazhi pa de ga/
417a6(mdo sde): gis 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mi'i rgyal po gser 'od dam pa ma sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po'i yon tan tshe 'di dang / mi 'ongs pa na 'byung ba 'di lta bu 'di dag mthong
417a7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas stong phrag brgya la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/ bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu med pa yongs su 'dzin par mthong nas snying brtse ba'i slad du/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pa/
417b1(mdo sde): cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa dang / gnod sbyin brgya stong phrag du ma rang rang gi khang pa na mchis pa dag/ spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khri shing dag gi gdugs
417b2(mdo sde): kyis bskul ma thag tu lus mi gda' bar bgyis te/ mi'i rgyal po de'i khang pa brtsegs pa phyag bdar ma bgyis pa legs par phyag bdar bgyis pa/ spos chab sna tshogs kyis chag chag legs
417b3(mdo sde): par btab pa / rgyan sna tshogs kyis legs par brgyan pa'i rgyal po'i pho brang ga la ba der chos mnyan pa'i slad du mchis par bgyi'o// mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / lha rnams
417b4(mdo sde): kyi dbang po brgya byin dang / lha mo chen mo dbyangs can dang / lha mo chen mo dpal dang / sa'i lha mo brtan ma dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po yang dag shes dang / gnod
417b5(mdo sde): sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nor bu bzang dang / 'phrog
417b6(mdo sde): ma bu lnga brgya'i 'khor can dang / klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa dang / klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dang / lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma dag lus mi gda' bar bgyis te/ mi'i rgyal po deni
417b7(mdo sde): pho brang rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa de ga la ba dang / chos smra ba de'i chos kyi khri mthon po rgyan sna tshogs kyis legs par brgyan pa/ me tog bkram pa'i sa la bshams par gyur pa/
418a1(mdo sde): ga la ba der chos mnyan pa'i slad du mchi bar bgyi'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa/ gnod sbyin brgya sto/
418a2(mdo sde): phrag du ma de dag thams cad dang mthun par bgyis te/ mi'i rgyal po dge ba'i grogs bgyid pa/ dge ba'i 'thob par bgyid pa/ bla na med pa chos kyi sbyin pa chen po sbyin pa de la chos bdud/
418a3(mdo sde): rtsi'i khu ba 'dis tshim par gyur ma thag tu/ mi'i rgyal po de la kun tu bsrung bar bgyi'o// yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang /
418a4(mdo sde): zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyi'o// rgyal po'i pho brang de dang / grong khyer de dang / yul de yang kun tu bsrung bar bgyi'o// yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang
418a5(mdo sde): yongs su bskyang ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyi'o// chad pa spang bar yang bgyi'o// yul de yang 'jigs pa dang / gnod pa dang / nad 'ge
418a6(mdo sde): pa dang / 'khrug pa thams cad las yongs su thar par bgyi'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig mi'i rgyal por gyur te/ mo'i rgyal po de'i yul du gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang
418a7(mdo sde): po'i rgyal po 'di byung la/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mi'i rgyal po de dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di
418b1(mdo sde): 'dzin pa dag la bsti stang mi bgyid/ bla mar mi bgyid/ rim gro mi bgyid/ mchod pa mi bgyid na/ bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / gnod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma la chos/
418b2(mdo sde): mnyan pa 'di dang / tshes bdud rtsi'i khu ba 'dis tshim par mi bgyid/ rim gro mi bgyid/ lha'i lus 'di dag gi gzi brjid yang rnam par 'phel bar mi bgyid/ bdag cag gi brtson 'grus//
418b3(mdo sde): dang / mthu dang / stobs kyang mi bskyed/ bdag cag gi lus la gzi brjid dang / dpal dang / phun sum tshogs pa yang rnam par 'phel bar mi bgyid do// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag
418b4(mdo sde): cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa dang / gnod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma dag gis yul de yal bar dor bar bgyi'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag
418b5(mdo sde): gis yul de yal bar bor na/ gnas pa'i lha'i tshogs thams cad kyis kyang yal bar 'dor bar 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das lha rnams kyis yul de yal bar bor na/ yul der
418b6(mdo sde): yul rnams 'khrug pa sna tshogs 'byung bar 'gyur/ rgyal po'i 'khrug pa mi bzad pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur/ yul na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad kyang 'thab pa skye ba dang / mtshang 'dra
